  16. ‌type t
  17. external create: unit -> t = "caml_ml_mutex_new"
  18. external lock: t -> unit = "caml_ml_mutex_lock"
  19. external try_lock: t -> bool = "caml_ml_mutex_try_lock"
  20. external unlock: t -> unit = "caml_ml_mutex_unlock"

  22. (* private re-export *)
  23. external reraise : exn -> 'a = "%reraise"

  25. (* cannot inline, otherwise flambda might move code around. *)
  26. let[@inline never] protect m f =
  27.   lock m;
  28.   match f() with
  29.   | x ->
  30.     unlock m; x
  31.   | exception e ->
  32.     (* NOTE: [unlock] does not poll for asynchronous exceptions *)
  33.     unlock m;
  34.     reraise e
